bookmark-manager.clearAllBookmarksInCurr: Clear all bookmarks in current file
bookmark-manager.showGutterInOverviewRul: Whether to display the corresponding position of the bookmark on the overview ruler
bookmark-manager.showTextDecoration.desc: Whether to display the text decoration of the bookmark's location
bookmark-manager.showGutterIcon.descript: Whether to display the gutter icon of the bookmark
bookmark-manager.colors.description: Custom bookmark color, object format: {" name": "value"}.Note that this color value should be in hexadecimal format as much as possible. This makes it easier for the plugin to have a transparent effect when highlighting the current bookmark line, so that the current line content will not be unclear after it is turned on.
bookmark-manager.defaultBookmarkIconColo: The default color of bookmark icon.
bookmark-manager.enableClick.description: Enable click to jump to bookmark location
bookmark-manager.createJsonFile.descript: After turning on this configuration, a `bookmark-manager.json` file will be created in the `.vscode` folder to store bookmark data.
bookmark-manager.changeUniversalBookmark: change the color of the universal bookmark
bookmark-manager.editUniversalBookmarkLa: Edit the label of the universal bookmark.
bookmark-manager.useBuiltInColors: When this configuration is turned on, the built-in color set will be added to the defined color (label) set; at the same time, when the user does not customize the color, the built-in color set will be used by default, otherwise the user-defined color set will be used.
bookmark-manager.autoSwitchSingleToMulti: Automatically switches a single-line bookmark to a multi-line bookmark when wrapping
bookmark-manager.clearAllBookmarksInColo: Clear bookmarks in this color group
bookmark-manager.clearAllBookmarksInIcon: Clear bookmarks in this icon group
bookmark-manager.listBookmarksInSelected: List the bookmarks in the selected group
bookmark-manager.ignoreFolders: When this is set, the creation of the storage file `bookmark-manager.json` in the `.vscode` directory under the folder directory in this array will be automatically ignored.
bookmark-manager.icons.description: Custom icon list, `key` is the custom icon name, `value` format is `prefix:name`, which is the `iconify` website icon name format. for example: 'mdi:bookmark'
